akn:section.akn:heading: Purpose and duties of the Office

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Purpose and duties The purpose of the Office is to support the Council in fulfilling the purposes and duties of the Council, as set forth in part A, and to support member agencies, by—

(e) Additional reports The Director may provide additional reports to Congress concerning the financial stability of the United States. The Director shall notify the Council of any such additional reports provided to Congress.
